ConfigurationOption.Value: select invusenum, description, usetype, status, statusdate, invowner, fromstoreloc, receipts, shipmentdate, shiptoattn, changeby, changedate, orgid, siteid, invuseid from invuse
Remove inventory usage and usage lines?

EventAction.Condition: IsInsert() and ${Use Type} <> 'TRANSFER' and ${Work Order} is null and ${Issue To} is null

ConfigurationOption.Value: Please enter charge details for the transactions

EventAction.Condition: IsInsert() and ${Work Order} is not null and !${MX_IS_OPEN_WORKORDER(${Work Order})}

ConfigurationOption.Value: Work Order is invalid or has an non-open status.

Struct._value: := eval( ${Work Order} is not null and ${Issue To} is not null, 'Work Order: ' || ${Work Order} || ' Issue To: ' || ${Issue To}, ${Work Order} is not null, 'Work Order: ' || ${Work Order}, ${Issue To} is not null, 'Issue To: ' || ${Issue To}, '' )

ConfigurationOption.Value: Offline inventory usage is not supported unless Offline ID role is available
